text: About 2.77 lakh families in Tiruvarur district have been distributed free mixies, grinders and fans at a cost of Rs.129.02 crore, said R.Kamaraj, Food Minister, here on Saturday. He distributed the free appliances to 2,515 beneficiaries at Mannargudi town in the presence of K. Parasuraman, MP, M. Mathivanan, Collector, and other elected representatives.
title: 2.77 lakh families get free mixies
